```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
census_api_key("ab8b0fa7ef0993c579097beb76d0321bce5af443", install = TRUE)
```
```{r}
var<-load_variables(2020,"acs5")
View(var)
```

```{r}
emp_stat_disability <-c("In the Labor Force,Employed with disability"= "C18120_004","In the Labor Force,Employed with no disability"= "C18120_005", "In the Labor force,unemployed with a disability" = "C18120_007", "In the Labor force,unemployed with no disability" = "C18120_008", "Not in the Labor force, with a disability" = "C18120_010", "Not in the Labor Force, with no disability" = "C18120_011")
```

```{r}
empl_status_disability <- get_acs(
  geography= "state",
  year = 2020,
  variables = emp_stat_disability,
  state= "IA"
)
View(empl_status_disability)
```

```{r}
write.csv(empl_status_disability, "Employement_Status.csv")  

ggplot(all_emp_stat, aes(variable, weight= estimate))+
  geom_bar()+
  labs(x="Employment Status", y= "population",
       title= "Employement Status by Disability")+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin= estimate-moe,
                    ymax= estimate+moe)
